english.segment1: lets set this city ablaze. we'll burn down the. monuments and build. mountains in our place we. could see everything. we. could start a fire (we could start a fire). and all shine in its light. shine so bright we burn in. eyes and heal the stories. ending.
english.segment2: this is the last. time we will ever bleed to. feel alive. consider. this a rehearsal your. heart of hearts rekindled. [2x]
english.segment3: the last. time we will ever bleed to. feel alive.
english.segment4: catching the fruits of our. labors and holdig our. hearts in our hands. waiting for you to sound a. prayer in the form of an. anchor replied by holding. you up in red skies bound. by love. let's set this. city ablaze we'll learn. how to start a fire(we'll learn. how to start a fire) shine. so bright we burn in eyes. (we could start a fire).
